definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (lightning-flash, cf. Pun. Barcas, surname of Hamilcar, cf. Nepos:Hamilcar 1, 1; Sab. [[ברקם]] DHM:ZMG, 1875, 592; Palm. [[ברק]] Vog:Palm. 76) son of Abinoam, & leader of Israel Ju Jdg 4:6, Jdg 4:8, Jdg 4:9, Jdg 4:10, Jdg 4:12, Jdg 4:14, Jdg 4:14, Jdg 4:15, Jdg 4:16, Jdg 4:22, Jdg 5:1, Jdg 5:12, Jdg 5:15.
